long_description: Test your speed in the lightweight, breathable SportHill Sprint T-shirt. Its wicking fabric keeps you cool and comfortable so you can push the pace during tough workouts. CoolTouch(TM) Rib polyester fabric wicks away moisture and dries quickly, and is engineered to help you feel cooler so you stay comfortable even when working hard. Sleeves and underarm side panels are made of stretch MicroMesh(TM) for increased breathability and comfort. Flatlock, contoured side seams and raglan sleeves minimize chafing. Reflective details on the front and back of the SportHill Sprint T-shirt increase visibility in low light. Overstock.
short_description: Test your speed in the lightweight, breathable SportHill Sprint T-shirt. Its wicking fabric keeps you cool and comfortable so you can push the pace during tough workouts.
